dmTitle.infoName: Description of how it is made

applic.displayText: Mountain bicycle and (Mountain storm Mk1 or Brook trekker Mk9)

reasonForUpdate.description: CPF_2020-040EPWG Bike Enhancement with elements and attributes missing in the samples

levelledPara.title: Brake system
levelledPara.para: The most important part of the bicycle is the brake system. Only a minimum maintenance of the brake system is necessary. But, when a problem does occur, make sure you to do the necessary maintenance as quickly as possible. If you do not do this the bicycle will be dangerous to use.
There are nine different types of brake systems. The one found on most bicycles is the cantilever brake (refer to par-0001).

levelledPara.title: Cantilever brake
levelledPara.para:
The brake system (refer to fig-0001) has these primary components:
the brake lever (refer to par-0003)
the brake cable
the brake arm
the brake clamp (also known as callipers)
the brake pads (refer to par-0002)
A cable runs from the lever to the caliper.

levelledPara.title: Brake Pads
levelledPara.para: The brake pads are a critical component of the braking system.

levelledPara.title: Brake Lever
levelledPara.para: The left brake lever holds the brake pads on the front wheel and the right brake pads hold the brakes on the rear wheel.

levelledPara.title: Brake Caliper
levelledPara.para: The brake caliper is the component that houses the brake pads.
